response.overview: In this hilarious Indian tale of comedy and intrigue, an eclectic group of claimants turns up -- and pulls out all the stops -- to prove that they're the rightful heirs to an estate worth a fortune. But which one of them is the bona fide legatee to the property? Mukesh Rawal, Naresh Shah, Dinyar Contractor, Anjana Desai, Sachi Joshi and Suresh Jairam head the cast.
response.tagline: Who is the rightful heirs to an estate worth a fortune?
response.title: Kapat
